description:
JDownloader simplifies and improves the process of downloading files from
            "free" file hosting sites like Rapidshare, MEGA, Mediafire, 4Shared, uploaded.to,
            Putlocker, Cyberlocker, etc.
            JDownloader offers downloading in multiple parallel streams, CAPTCHA recognition, and
            automatic file extraction.
            JDownloader can import CCF, RSDF and the new DLC files.
summary: JDownloader is an internet download manager
author: AppWork GmbH
